Acta Physica Polonica B Proceedings Supplement 15, 1-X1 (2022)
THE 7th CONFERENCE OF THE POLISH SOCIETY ON RELATIVITY
Łódź, Poland, 20–23 September, 2021
Organized and sponsored by:
Polish Society on Relativity Institute of Physics, Faculty of Technical Physics Information Technology and Applied Mathematics Łódź University of Technology Faculty of Physics, University of Warsaw Faculty of Physics, Astronomy and Applied Computer Science, Jagiellonian University
ADAM CHUDECKI
Editor of the Proceedings
Honorary Patronage
His Magnificence Rector of the Lodz University of Technology Prof. Krzysztof Jóźwik
LOCAL ORGANIZING COMMITTEE
A. Chudecki H. Jóźwiak M. Dobrski E. Nowak M. Dunajski P. Podleśny M. Flakiewicz M. Przanowski (chair) S. Formański J. Tosiek
SCIENTIFIC COMMITTEE
P. Bizoń A. Krasiński A. Borowiec A. Królak P. Chruściel J. Lewandowski M. Dąbrowski J. Lukierski M. Dunajski P. Mach J. Garecki E. Malec P. Jaranowski M. Przanowski (chair) J. Jezierski M. Rogatko J. Jurkiewicz A. Rostworowski J. Kijowski P. Sułkowski J. Kowalski-Glikman J. Tafel

title: THE 7th CONFERENCE OF THE POLISH SOCIETY ON RELATIVITY
